articles.author: Shantanu David
articles.title: Motorola doesn’t want to leverage nostalgia but focus on disruptive tech: Shivam Ranjan - Exchange4Media
articles.description: In light of Razr series launch, Ranjan, Head of Marketing at Motorola - Asia Pacific, speaks about disrupting markets, changing advertising strategies and working closely with influencers
articles.content:
Most of us reading this are old enough to remember the palpable excitement generated by the release of flashy new not-yet-smartphones in the early 2000s.
These feature devices came out of the storef… [+3514 chars]
